title: New Inquisitor Nautilus Skin
body: I watched the skin spotlight for Inquisitor Nautilus and was kind of disappointed, I will explain why.  Almost every movement Nautilus makes causes parts of his body/armor to pass through other parts, It just looks clustered and like it was rushed.  Nautilus is one of my favorite champions and I'm all for a new skin but I am hoping Riot takes more time with this skin and cleans it up before releasing it.

replies.body:
Hi there! 

Keep in mind that the SkinSpotlights video was made when this skin first hit PBE. 

Skins on PBE are constantly changing, and issues are being fixed. Many of the clipping issues have been fixed since the video was first created. :]

Do the Skin Spotlight videos get remade when the skin releases to live? I ask as a person who very occasionally buys skins and relies heavily on the skin spotlight videos for whether I will enjoy the visual appeal of a particular skin before deciding whether or not to buy. Seeing those early iteration issues might turn me away from an otherwise fine skin if I didn't know those issues had been fixed.

Skin Spotlights isn't something that we (Riot) makes. 

They're usually updated closer to release, though, which is why the video up now is the 'Pre-Release' video. :]

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=uoFi0ryV,comment-id=000000010001,timestamp=2015-02-04T20:09:15.366+0000)
>
> Skin Spotlights isn't something that we (Riot) makes.

What o.o So it's a fanmade thing?? O.o

Last i checked the Skins Spotlight page is not an official riot page. It's up to them how up to date their content is. Follow S@20 as well and you can keep tabs on if they updated or not. Basing purchases on out of date information is not recommended :)

> [{quoted}](name=Lumus Avatar,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=uoFi0ryV,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2015-02-04T18:47:00.743+0000)
>
> Seeing those early iteration issues might turn me away from an otherwise fine skin.

The nice thing about Skins Spotlight is they keep up all their old videos and update as changes are made. For example, you can search "Kitty Katarina old model skin", and it should have a video of what it looked like when it was first released. While also having a video of skins when they get a model update. =P

The blue mohawk really ruins this skin for me.  I don't get how it fits the theme at all.
I love everything about it otherwise (although some deeper contrasts would be nice right now the colors run into each-other a lot ).
I have AstroNautilus... will I buy the new skin?  Yes... because Nautilus is my jungle boss.
It looks much better, it's gotten some updates on the PBE. However, it's not called Warden Nautilus and I am sad

Hey, I also really like nautilus and I heard the skin team was not all that keen on keeping the eye glow. I agree the two red dots would look strange, but I feel like the model looks kind of empty without some sort of particle there. (Other than while the w is up)

Hey op.
I made a vote for Inquisitor nautilus. 
Please vote since you seem to like nautilus 
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/HE0wsE5v-skin-feedback-inquisitor-nautilus
